name: Input Number
description: This is an example of description that could be used for this kind of situations where your dont know what to say

api.description: with this property you set the format of the numbers
with this property you can add the sum and minus operator and you can choose the number of increase or decrease
with this property you disable the component
this is the value of the autocomplete
Callback function that is fired when the autocomplete value changes

features.description: with the GSInputNumber component you can choose the format that you want to give to the number
with the GSInputNumber component you can add the sum and minus operator and you can set the increase or decrease
